title: Kiyma
overview: After spending 3 years in prison, Ömer, Poyraz and Tufan come to Istanbul from Adana and open a kebab shop. Now they are done with the illegal world. However, reality does not go as they planned. When they are defrauded while renting a shop in Istanbul, they encounter a new world on their way to get their money back. They gain the trust of Uncle, a big and respected mafia boss. Uncle's son, Yiğit, has been hostile to Ömer, Poyraz and Tufan since the first day, and he will confront them.
